org.apache.logging.log4j.core.lookup

Class AbstractConfigurationAwareLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.lookup.AbstractLookup
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.lookup.AbstractConfigurationAwareLookup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationAware, StrLookup
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Interpolator, Log4jLookup

    public abstract class AbstractConfigurationAwareLookup
extends AbstractLookup
implements ConfigurationAware
    StrLookup that is ConfigurationAware. Handles saving the Configuration.
    Since:
    2.6
